characters.description: A young girl who becomes a mother figure to the Lost Boys in Neverland. She is kind, nurturing, and loves telling stories.
characters.portrait_prompt: A young girl with a kind face, wearing a simple nightgown. She has long brown hair, expressive eyes, and a gentle smile. The setting should evoke a cozy nursery at night, lit by a warm glow, with books and toys scattered around.

A boy with a youthful and mischievous face, clad in skeleton leaves and the juices that ooze out of trees. He has a wild, tousled look, piercing eyes, and a playful smirk. The background should include a lush, fantastical forest with glowing lights and strange flora.
characters.description: A mischievous and eternally young boy who lives in Neverland. He is adventurous, cocky, and has a fear of growing up.

characters.portrait_prompt: A lovely lady with a romantic mind, wearing a white gown. She has a kind face, with a sweet mocking mouth, and a gentle, caring gaze. She should be shown in a cozy home setting, surrounded by children's drawings and books, with a warm light.
characters.description: The loving and romantic mother of Wendy, John, and Michael. She has a sweet, mocking mouth and a habit of tidying up her children's minds.

characters.portrait_prompt: A distinguished gentleman with a somewhat serious face, wearing a formal suit with a tie. He has a well-groomed appearance, a stern look with underlying gentleness, and a receding hairline. He should be pictured either in a traditional study, with books and papers, or in a more domestic setting with his children.
characters.description: Wendy's father, a deep and honorable man who knows about stocks and shares. He is initially proud and sometimes boastful, but shows remorse for his actions.

characters.portrait_prompt: A young boy with a serious, practical face, wearing a nightgown. He has neat hair and a determined expression. The setting should be the Neverland, with a boat turned upside down on a beach in the background.
characters.description: The older brother of Wendy and Michael, practical and somewhat boastful. He is loyal but sometimes acts without thinking.
The youngest of the Darling siblings, who is still young enough to believe and imagine. He is a sweet boy who is easily influenced by others and wants a mother.
characters.portrait_prompt: A very small boy with an innocent and slightly bewildered face, wearing a nightgown. He should be shown looking a bit confused but also eager to explore. The background should include a wigwam and other fantastical elements.

characters.description: The prim Newfoundland dog who is the Darling children's nurse. She is thorough, protective, and believes in old-fashioned remedies.
characters.portrait_prompt: A large, dignified Newfoundland dog with a gentle face. She should have a nurse's cap and an umbrella in her mouth, and should be shown in a nursery setting, looking over her charges.

characters.description: A small, jealous fairy who is Peter Pan's companion. She is quick-tempered but can be loyal and helpful.
characters.portrait_prompt: A tiny, exquisite fairy with an impish face, dressed in a skeleton leaf. She should be slightly inclined to embonpoint, with a mischievous grin and glowing wings. The background should be whimsical and magical, with sparkles and glittering lights.
A midget in a long skirt and maid's cap, with a tired and somewhat stern face. She should be shown in a practical domestic setting, perhaps in a kitchen or a hallway, looking displeased.
characters.description: The Darling's servant, who is practical and a bit grumpy. She is not fond of Nana and does not understand the children's imaginative world.
The owner of the kindergarten school that the Darling children attend.
characters.portrait_prompt: A prim and proper woman with spectacles, wearing a formal dress. She should have a stern but professional look, and should be pictured in a school setting with children's drawings and educational materials around.

characters.description: A gentle, melancholic, and unfortunate member of the Lost Boys. He is the most easily tricked and also the humblest.
characters.portrait_prompt: A young boy with a gentle and slightly melancholic face, dressed in bear skin. He should look humble and kind, with sad eyes. The setting should evoke the Neverland, with some trees and forest in the background.

characters.description: A gay and debonair member of the Lost Boys. He often recalls a detail or two about his past with his parents.
characters.portrait_prompt: A young boy with a cheerful and stylish face, dressed in bear skin. He should look lively and carefree. The background should suggest an adventurous life in the Neverland, with fantastical elements.
A young boy with a conceited look, dressed in bear skin. He should have a tilted nose and a self-satisfied expression. The background could be a fantastical forest with a touch of humor.
characters.description: A conceited member of the Lost Boys. He believes he remembers a lot about the world before he was lost.

characters.portrait_prompt: A young boy with a mischievous grin, dressed in bear skin. He should look a bit naughty and adventurous, with a playful glint in his eyes. The background should evoke the Neverland's wild side.
characters.description: A mischievous member of the Lost Boys who often has to deliver up his person when Peter said, “Stand forth the one who did this thing.”

characters.portrait_prompt: Two identical boys with similar playful expressions, dressed in bear skins. They should be shown close together, looking a bit confused but also eager to please. The background should be whimsical, perhaps in a forest setting.
characters.description: Two identical members of the Lost Boys who are always vague about themselves and try to remain together to give satisfaction. Peter never quite knew what twins were.

characters.portrait_prompt: A tall and menacing pirate with a black, cadaverous face and long curls that look like black candles. He has blue eyes, an iron hook, and a cruel smirk. The background should be dark and foreboding, perhaps the deck of a pirate ship at night.
characters.description: The main antagonist, a cruel and cunning pirate captain with an iron hook for a hand. He has a great fear of crocodiles and a deep-seated hatred for Peter Pan.

characters.portrait_prompt: A handsome Italian pirate with a dark and intense look. He should have black hair, dark eyes, and a cruel expression, and should be wearing pirate attire, with a red bandana or earring. The background should be a rugged seaside or a ship setting.
characters.description: A handsome Italian pirate known for cutting his name in letters of blood. He is a loyal member of Hook's crew.

characters.portrait_prompt: A short, somewhat comical Irish pirate with a genial face and a friendly smile. He should be wearing spectacles and should be shown wiping them with his sleeve instead of his weapon after a fight. The background should be a pirate ship setting.
characters.description: An oddly genial Irish pirate who is Hook's bo'sun. He is simple, kind, and somewhat inept, and is known for stabbing without offense.

characters.portrait_prompt: A pirate with a somewhat refined and prim look, dressed in pirate garb but with a hint of school-like attire. He should have a disdainful expression, and the setting should be a pirate ship or a dark, shadowy alley.
characters.description: A dainty, refined pirate who was once an usher in a public school. He is Hook's right-hand man, but is not as brave.

characters.portrait_prompt: A heavily tattooed pirate with a fierce look. He should have tattoos all over his body and should be pictured with a menacing expression, with a setting that shows the rough life of a pirate.
characters.description: A heavily tattooed and formidable pirate. He has been severely punished by his former captain, Flint.
A pirate said to be Black Murphy’s brother, but this was never proven.
characters.portrait_prompt: A large, rough-looking pirate with a menacing expression, wearing typical pirate attire. He should have a dark or mysterious quality about him and should be in a setting that reflects the dangers of a pirate's life.

characters.description: A pirate, also known as Morgan’s Skylights.
characters.portrait_prompt: A pirate with a shady look, dressed in worn and tattered clothing. The setting should be a dark and dangerous place, reflecting the rough lifestyle of a pirate.

characters.description: A pirate whose hands are fixed on backwards.
characters.portrait_prompt: A peculiar pirate with his hands fixed on backwards. He should be shown in a slightly awkward posture, with a quirky and unusual appearance. The setting should be a chaotic pirate ship scene.

characters.description: A ruffian pirate, long known and feared on the Spanish Main.
characters.portrait_prompt: A fierce pirate with a rugged and dangerous look. He should be wearing pirate attire and should be pictured with a scowl and a menacing pose, with the background suggesting a turbulent seafaring life.

A tough and menacing pirate with a hardened face. He should be wearing tattered pirate clothing and should look rough, perhaps with a scar or two. The background should be a pirate ship setting, with rough seas in the distance.
characters.description: A ruffian pirate, long known and feared on the Spanish Main.

characters.portrait_prompt: A beautiful dusky princess with long dark hair. She should be wearing traditional Native American attire, adorned with feathers and beads. Her expression should be proud, determined, and fierce. The setting should be a lush, natural environment with a clear sky.
characters.description: The beautiful princess of the Piccaninny tribe. She is proud, brave, and fiercely protective of those she cares about.
A brave redskin of the Piccaninny tribe known for having many scalps. He is a strong and formidable warrior.
characters.portrait_prompt: A brave Native American warrior with a muscular build and a fierce expression. He should have many scalps strung around him, and should be dressed in traditional attire with face paint. The setting should be a forest, showing his stealth and agility.

characters.description: Wendy's daughter. She is an inquisitive child who loves stories about Peter Pan, and she is ultimately chosen by Peter Pan to be his new mother.
characters.portrait_prompt: A young girl with an inquisitive and bright face. She should be wearing a nightgown and should look curious and open-minded. The setting should be a cozy nursery, perhaps looking out at a moonlit night.

A young girl, similar in appearance to Jane, with an innocent and slightly dreamy expression. She should be depicted with elements of fantasy and wonder around her. The setting should evoke a magical nursery where stories come to life.
characters.description: Jane's daughter, who Peter chooses to be his mother in a never-ending cycle.
